title: Generalized Homogeneous Derivations of Graded Rings
abstract:
In this paper, we introduce a novel concept in graded rings called
generalized homogeneous derivations, which serve as a natural generalization of
the homogeneous derivations introduced by Kanunnikov. We provide an example
demonstrating that the class of homogeneous derivations is strictly contained
within the class of generalized homogeneous derivations. Furthermore, we extend
several significant results, originally established for prime rings, to the
context of gr-prime rings.
